thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.client.renderers.WebGLGeometry
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.AbstractGeometry
        • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Geometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsteriskGeometry, BoxGeometry, CircleGeometry, CylinderGeometry, ExtrudeGeometry, LatheGeometry, ParametricGeometry, PlaneGeometry, PolyhedronGeometry, RingGeometry, SphereGeometry, TorusGeometry, TorusKnotGeometry, TubeGeometry

    public class Geometry
extends AbstractGeometry
    Base class for geometries. A geometry holds all data necessary to describe a 3D model. 
     
 Geometry geometry = new Geometry();
 
 geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( -10, 10, 0 ) ); 
 geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( -10, -10, 0 ) );
 geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( 10, -10, 0 ) );  
 geometry.getFaces().add( new Face3( 0, 1, 2 ) );  
 
 geometry.computeBoundingSphere();
    Author:
    thothbot

    • Method Detail

      • isDynamic

        public boolean isDynamic()
        Set to true if attribute buffers will need to change in runtime (using "dirty" flags). Unless set to true internal typed arrays corresponding to buffers will be deleted once sent to GPU. Defaults to true.
        Returns:

      • setDynamic

        public void setDynamic(boolean dynamic)

      • getSkinWeights

        public java.util.List<Vector4> getSkinWeights()
        Gets the List of skinning weights, matching number and order of vertices.

      • getSkinIndices

        public java.util.List<Vector4> getSkinIndices()
        Gets the List of skinning indices, matching number and order of vertices.

      • getLineDistances

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getLineDistances()

      • setColors

        public void setColors(java.util.List<Color> colors)

      • getColors

        public java.util.List<Color> getColors()
        Gets List of vertex Colors, matching number and order of vertices.

        Used in PointCloud, Line.
        Meshes use per-face-use-of-vertex colors embedded directly in faces. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.colorsNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • setFaces

        public void setFaces(java.util.List<Face3> faces)

      • getFaces

        public java.util.List<Face3> getFaces()
        Gets the List of triangles: Face3. The array of faces describe how each vertex in the model is connected with each other. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.elementsNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • setVertices

        public void setVertices(java.util.List<Vector3> vertices)

      • getVertices

        public java.util.List<Vector3> getVertices()
        Gets List of Vector3. The array of vertices holds every position of points in the model. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.verticesNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • getMorphTargets

        public java.util.List<Geometry.MorphTarget> getMorphTargets()
        Gets the List of Geometry.MorphTarget. Morph vertices match number and order of primary vertices.

      • getMorphNormals

        public java.util.List<Geometry.MorphNormal> getMorphNormals()
        Get the List of Geometry.MorphNormal. Morph normals have similar structure as morph targets
        Returns:

      • getMorphColors

        public java.util.List<Geometry.MorphColor> getMorphColors()
        Gets the List of Geometry.MorphColor. Morph colors have similar structure as Geometry.MorphTarget. Morph colors can match either number and order of faces (face colors) or number of vertices (vertex colors).

      • getFaceVertexUvs

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<Vector2>>> getFaceVertexUvs()
        Gets the List of face UV layers. Each UV layer is an array of UVs matching the order and number of vertices in faces. To signal an update in this array, Geometry.uvsNeedUpdate needs to be set to true.

      • setFaceVertexUvs

        public void setFaceVertexUvs(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<Vector2>>> faceVertexUvs)

      • computeVertexNormals

        public void computeVertexNormals(boolean areaWeighted)
        Computes vertex normals by averaging face normals. Face normals must be existing / computed beforehand.

      • computeMorphNormals

        public void computeMorphNormals()
        Computes morph normals.

      • computeTangents

        public void computeTangents()
        Computes vertex tangents.
        Based on terathon.com

        Geometry must have vertex UVs (layer 0 will be used).

        Specified by:
        computeTangents in class AbstractGeometry

      • computeLineDistances

        public void computeLineDistances()
        Compute distances between vertices for Line geometries.

      • computeBoundingBox

        public void computeBoundingBox()
        Computes bounding box of the geometry.
        Specified by:
        computeBoundingBox in class AbstractGeometry

      • computeBoundingSphere

        public void computeBoundingSphere()
        Computes bounding sphere of the geometry.

        Neither bounding boxes or bounding spheres are computed by default. They need to be explicitly computed, otherwise they are null.

        Specified by:
        computeBoundingSphere in class AbstractGeometry

      • mergeVertices

        public int mergeVertices()
        Checks for duplicate vertices with hashmap. Duplicated vertices are removed and faces' vertices are updated.

        Creates a new clone of the Geometry.
